text: The Hanteng X5 is a compact Crossover SUV made by Hanteng Autos from 2016 to 2021. == History and Features == The Hanteng X5 was launched at the Guangzhou Auto Show in 2016. its the second model from Hanteng after the Hanteng X7 and is positioned below the X7 and had a 1.5 liter petrol engine with a 5-speed manual or CVT transmissions it was improved in 2018 but the improved version was relaunched in 2020. it had a pre-production electric version called Hanteng X5 EV that previewed a electric version of the car. == Markets == The Hanteng X5 was sold mainly in the Chinese Market during its production but it was also made and sold locally in Iran. == Discontinuation == The production of the Hanteng X5 ended in 2021 and was discontinued without a sucessor. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles
title: Hanteng X5
